scripts.start: npm run clean && concurrently "eleventy --serve --port=8080" "npm run minify-css -- --watch" "npm run minify-js -- --watch"
scripts.build: ELEVENTY_PRODUCTION=true eleventy && NODE_ENV=production npm run minify-css && npm run minify-js
scripts.minify-js: mkdir -p dist/js && terser src/js/main.js -o dist/js/main.min.js -c -m && terser src/js/insights-and-strategies.js -o dist/js/insights-and-strategies.min.js -c -m
